snippet: President Obama’s proposed reforms should reduce expensive litigation and encourage innovation.
abstract: Editorial supports Pres Obama's proposed reforms that should reduce litigation and encourage innovation; notes reforms are aimed at so-called 'patent trolls,' businesses that buy patents with intent of suing individuals and businesses for using or selling products they claim violate their patents; notes proposal has bipartisan support.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s proposed reforms should reduce expensive litigation and encourage innovation.

headline.seo: Obama’s Promising Reforms to Fight ‘Patent Trolls’
